Dark One/Hiss:



He cursed as a spear dug into his left side, though, it hit no vital 
parts.  Similar to what humans called a "flesh wound".  He raised his 
missile launcher firing a rocket off at Spears.  (Or the plate she's 
hiding behind).

---

Dark One pulled up, a shot skinning one of his back fins near his 
engines.  He was now upside down, facing Shadow Wing.  He opened fire 
with a barrage of 5 rapid laser bolts, not wanting to use up to much 
energy to take out such a simple target.
